result.summary: Updated layout components to match the HTML design example. Sidebar: Changed to fixed w-64 with white background, border-right, logo section with purple icon box (bg-primary rounded-lg), 'Alma Reports' title, 'Analytics Manager' subtitle, navigation items using Material Icons with active state (border-right-4 border-primary, bg-primary/10 background), removed theme toggle. MainLayout: Updated to use flex layout with sidebar and scrollable main content area with p-8 padding. Header: Changed to match design with text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight title, text-slate-500 subtitle, and outline Refresh button with Material Icon on the right side.

MainLayout: Updated to use flex layout with sidebar and scrollable main content area with p-8 padding. Header: Changed to match design with text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight title, text-slate-500 subtitle, and outline Refresh button with Material Icon on the right side.
